column2: Soothing Cucumber Facial Scrub With Apricot Seeds
column10: The soothing feel of cucumber meets the gentle exfoliation of apricot in our wonderful scrub. While the apricot cleanses the top layer of dead cells and reveals fresh, glowing skin from below, vitamin-rich cucumber cools it down gently. This non-abrasive scrub also reduces excess sebum production, which makes it perfect for those with oily skin.
